alert.note: Alert for Western Greenbrier (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued November 20 at 1:45AM EST until November 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Western Greenbrier County. * WHEN...until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds with gusts up to 40 to 45 mph are expected across the higher terrain. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory is issued when strong winds will combine with cold temperatures for several hours to create dangerously cold conditions for exposed skin. Use caution while outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
